Challenge: Throughout the game, generate at least 45 energy from Boon of Vigor (or from Boon of Sunshine's Promise, if playing with the Sunshine aspect)
Mastery_Advantage: 1 invader pushed by Massive Flooding (threshold level 1 and 2) may now be pushed 2 lands away if you pay 1 energy.

Challenge: Win on a turn where at least 13 fast powers in total between the two players are being played, and no slow power is being played. Innate powers count for this calculation. This mastery cannot be unlocked when playing with the Blitz scenario.
Mastery_Advantage: You gain a permanent Air element

Challenge: Generate at least 30 fears by targeting lands with your sacred site and at least 4 Dahan
Mastery_Advantage: The 4th node of your bottom presence track (the second '3 card plays') now also gives you: 'gather 1 Dahan to 1 of your lands'

Challenge: Reach Defend 50 in a land with your sacred site at any point in the game.
Mastery_Advantage: You now have a new growth option: Reclaim half your cards (round up) and gain a power card.

Challenge: Have at least 2 Dahan in each land at any point in the game
Mastery_Advantage: When you start the game, add 1 additional Dahan in the lands with your starting presence

Challenge: Over the course of the game, prevent at least 20 Ravage or Build actions with Choke the Land with Green
Mastery_Advantage: Your permanent growth option (Add a presence to Jungle or Wetland) now has unlimited range

Challenge: Generate at least 40 fear in a single action.
Mastery_Advantage: The first time To Dream a Thousand Deaths generates at least 1 fear in a turn, generate 1 more fear.

Challenge: Drown at least 25 invaders in a single turn
Mastery_Advantage: When drowning invaders, instead of gaining 1 energy, you may generate 1 fear.

Challenge: Have a Wilds token in every land at any point in the game
Mastery_Advantage: When the game starts, before playing the first explore action, you may add 2 Wilds tokens wherever you wish on the island

Challenge: Beasts must do at least 80 damage total over the course of the game.
Mastery_Advantage: When setting up the game but before doing the first explore action, add 2 beasts tokens anywhere on the island.

Challenge: Throughout the game, destroy at least 35 invaders with Blazing Presence
Mastery_Advantage: At the beginning of the game, add 2 more blight tokens (from the box) to your starting land.

Challenge: Reach the highest threshold on both of your innate powers, and win the game with the Serpent Rouses in Anger action. None of your presences may be on blighted lands.
Mastery_Advantage: Deep Slumber's presence limit is now of 6/8/9/10/11/12/13 presences, instead of 5/7/8/10/11/12/13.

Challenge: Win by sacrificing 12 presences with Explosive Eruption, by wiping all invaders off the board.
Mastery_Advantage: Any Dahan your actions destroy after the first one may be pushed instead.

Challenge: Have at least 24 blight tokens on the island.
Mastery_Advantage: Whenever Deep Layers Exposed to the Surface triggers, you may instead gain a major power.

Challenge: Have a strife token in every land
Mastery_Advantage: When the island becomes blighted: immediately, add a strife token on any 2 invaders.

Challenge: Have at least 40 beasts on the board (you may include your sacred sites when checking this condition)
Mastery_Advantage: During the spirit phase, you may return one presence from your sacred site to the presence track. If you do so, put a beasts token in its place

Challenge: Have 4 of each elemental marker at any point in the game
Mastery_Advantage: When you start the game, you may prepare any 4 elements (instead of 1 moon / 1 air / 1 earth)

Challenge: Have at least 6 inland lands with beasts, 6 inland lands with wilds, 6 inland lands with disease and 6 inland lands with badlands by game end.
Mastery_Advantage: At game start, also add 1 badland token and 1 wilds token in any land on the island

Challenge: Throughout the game, generate at least 35 fear with The Terror of a Slowly Unfolding Plague
Mastery_Advantage: At most once per turn, when a blight is added to the island, generate 1 fear

Challenge: Throughout the game, generate at least 40 fear from Slow and Silent Death
Mastery_Advantage: Slow and Silent Death may now generate up to 6 fear, instead of 5.

Challenge: Reach all thresholds of all your innate powers in a single turn
Mastery_Advantage: You may use one of your 3 growth options to change an element (obtained from Slowly Coalescing Nature) on your presence track

Challenge: Spend a total of 25 time over the course of a game. Have at least 20 cards in your Days that Never Were deck by game end.
Mastery_Advantage: When you start the game, put 8 minor and 8 major powers in your Days that Never Were deck (instead of 6).

Challenge: Repeat a power at least 7 times (for a total of 8x the effect) during a turn. You must win on the 8th usage of that power.
Mastery_Advantage: You may now use Pour Down Power Across the Island up to 6 times per turn (instead of max. 5 times per turn).

Challenge: Win the game on a turn where you gathered all invaders in a single land. That land must be isolated.
Mastery_Advantage: Close the Ways now has a 4th threshold: 4 air, 2 sun: isolate target land.
